Guerrilla

Fifty Fathoms and ABC Signature for Sky Atlantic and Showtime
6 x 60 min. episodes
Director(s) Sam Miller, John Ridley
Producer(s) John Ridley, Patrick Spence, Idris Elba, Michael McDonald
With Idris Elba, Seeta Indrani, Sophia Brown

Oscar winner John Ridley’s story of two lovers taking a stand amid the racial struggle of 1970s London.
